title: Multimedia Project Management Practical Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of elementary project management concepts and experience using multimedia production tools
context.additional_context: Developing project management competencies through real-world case analysis in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze various multimedia project cases to establish management strategies for each phase of the project lifecycle.
Learners can propose solutions for team collaboration and resource allocation issues based on practitioner case studies.
Learners can design effective communication and risk management plans using smartphone-based tools under constrained conditions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
